name: Special Black Jack
description:
If you want to win a match you need to use your brain, and you need to be a little lucky, everything written on the help page, and you can play the tutorial to understand the game play.

Tips: You can invite someone for a play by click on his Nickname or you can play ranked games after a registration. Use the full screen button for the best quality.

I am a student and this is my first multiplayer game, Thank you for trying it, hope you will enjoy it!
